about_the_game:
■ About
"Link: The Unleashed Nexus RH" is a fast-paced platformer and 3D action game. Players traverse the world of "HAVEN," which is controlled by the mysterious object known as the "Nexus," utilizing various actions. The game features fantastic parkour that emphasizes a sense of speed and floating, allowing players to glide through the air, kick off walls, and leap over enemies.

The game boasts over 15 diverse stages, including underwater gardens, ruined floating cities, and levitating temples.

Glide, leap over enemies, and kick off walls to forge your own path. Observe the characteristics of the numerous gimmicks present in each stage to construct the optimal route. The goal is to destroy the "Realm Nexus" located at the deepest part of each stage. Progress through the stages and reach the "World's Exit" at the edge of the sky.

With leaderboard support, players can discover hidden routes and original techniques to challenge the fastest records.

The game caters to a wide range of players, with assist systems for beginners and advanced equipment for experienced players to achieve even greater speeds. Collect scattered memory fragments throughout the world to access new skills and forgotten memories, and unravel the mystery of the Nexus.

Face off against multiple powerful and unique bosses.

Stand against the world's gigantic defense mechanisms and other ability users (Linkers). Precisely dodge enemy attacks and launch counterattacks as you pass by to prevail in these intense battles.


■ Restructured Heaven
This version is a complete remake of the indie game released in 2014-2015, only in Japan.

While the storyline and concept are the same, the player experience has completely evolved from the past version, and the playtime is four to five times bigger.



■ Gameplay
Use the "Thruster" ability to glide through the air at high speed as your main weapon, run through, and step on various enemies and mechanisms to reach your goal.

More actions will unlock as you progress in the game: discover hidden items, polish your technique, look for shortcuts, and best routes for speed runs.


■ Story
HAVEN is a multi-layered world ruled by the mysterious crystal Nexus.
You wake up on the lowest level of this realm with no memories and as your sole clue: "Aim for the sky" engraved in your arm.
As you try to run off to find the "World’s Exit", many entities known as "Linkers" will defy and fight you using their abilities, based on various grounds.
What awaits you beyond the "World’s Exit"..?

Welcome to the "Reconstructed" fake paradise.
